settings.name: Name

settings.clearCacheConfirm: Do you want to clear cache data?
settings.deleteAccountConfirm:
Are you sure you want to delete your account?

This action cannot be undone and all data will be permanently deleted.
settings.deleteAccountContact: Please contact customer service to complete account deletion.

guide.title: App Usage Guide
guide.introText: A system that monitors the fastening status of safety hooks in real-time and sends immediate notifications when unfastened.
guide.section1_1: Select a site after logging in.
guide.section1_2: You can create a new site or join an existing one.
guide.section1_3: Equipment and notifications are managed per site.
guide.section2_1: You can check the real-time status of registered equipment.
guide.section2_2: Unfastened (Red): Safety hook is not fastened
guide.section2_3: Single Fastened (Yellow): Only one side is fastened
guide.section2_4: Double Fastened (Green): Both sides are fastened
guide.section3_1: A notification is sent if the unfastened state persists for more than 5 seconds.
guide.section3_2: You can check up to 30 past notification histories.
guide.section4_1: Enter the Wi-Fi network name to search for devices.
guide.section4_2: Select a device waiting for registration to register it.
guide.section4_3: You can specify the device name and worker.
guide.caution1: A notification is automatically sent if the unfastened state persists for more than 5 seconds.
guide.caution2: You must enter the Wi-Fi network name accurately when registering devices.
guide.caution3: Equipment and notifications are managed separately by site.

siteSelect.title: Select Site
siteSelect.subtitle: Please select the site to manage
siteSelect.selectSiteInfo: Only equipment from the selected site is displayed on the dashboard.
siteSelect.changeSiteInfo: You can change the site at any time in the environment settings.
siteSelect.deleteConfirm:
Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}" site?

This action cannot be undone.
siteSelect.leaveConfirm:
Are you sure you want to leave "{{name}}" site?

You will need to enter the password again to access it.
siteSelect.selectError: An error occurred while selecting the site.
siteSelect.passwordError: An error occurred while verifying the password.
siteSelect.deleteError: An error occurred while deleting the site.
siteSelect.leaveError: An error occurred while leaving the site.
siteSelect.leavePartialMessage: {{success}} left successfully, but {{failed}} failed to leave.
siteSelect.deletePartialMessage: {{success}} deleted successfully, but {{failed}} failed to delete.
siteSelect.addSiteToStart: Start by adding a new site.
siteSelect.addSiteAdminInfo: When you add a site, you will automatically receive administrator privileges for that site.
siteSelect.enterPasswordForSite: Please enter the password for "{{name}}" site.
siteSelect.tryDifferentSearch: Please try a different search term.

device.searchPlaceholder: Search by equipment name or worker name...
device.waitingRegistration: Awaiting registration. Please register the device name in Worker Registration.
device.noWaitingDevices: There are currently no devices awaiting registration.
device.waitingDevicesInfo: Please ensure the Arduino is connected to the same Wi-Fi network and has transmitted data within the last 2 minutes.
device.registerInfo:
When registering Arduino: Your device must be connected to the same Wi-Fi network as the Arduino to detect devices awaiting registration.
After registration: You can check the Arduino status from any Wi-Fi network.
device.unregisterConfirm:
Are you sure you want to unregister '{{deviceId}}'?
It will be moved to the pending registration list.
device.wifiInputRequired: Please enter the WiFi name accurately.
device.wifiInputNote: (Case-insensitive, only devices with exact match will be displayed)
device.deviceIdWorkerNameRequired: Both device ID and worker name are required.
device.wifiNameWarning:
üí° Please enter the WiFi name accurately.
(Case-insensitive, only devices with exact match will be displayed)
device.resetWiFiConfirm:
Do you want to reset WiFi for device '{{deviceId}}'?
The Arduino will switch to AP mode so you can configure a new WiFi.
device.resetWiFiSuccess:
WiFi reset signal has been sent.
The Arduino will switch to AP mode soon.
device.resetWiFiError: Failed to send WiFi reset signal.
device.apModeInfo: When setting up Arduino for the first time, connect via AP mode
device.apModeSteps:
1. Turn on Arduino power
2. Connect to 'ZeroFall-XXXX' WiFi
3. Open 192.168.4.1 in browser
4. Scan QR code or manually enter WiFi info
5. After saving, Arduino will automatically connect to WiFi
device.addressCopied:
192.168.4.1 has been copied to clipboard.
Paste it in your browser address bar.
